content: this makes a cute wristlet or a geeky dice bag the dragon egg is a tribute to daenerys targaryen s dragon eggs in a game of thrones 26 june 2011 beta version this has not been test crocheted i have done my best to be clear and accurate but you know how it is please let me know if you find any problems with this pattern 25 jan 2013 if the bag is worked from the outside holding the project so that the opening of the bag is behind the hands the petals will lie down as shown if the bag is worked from the inside holding the project so that the opening of the bag is between you and and your hands the petals will stand up and seem upside down both ways look cute but please be aware that it does make a difference
